price: 75. Ma karaan inay u gargaaraan, oo iyaga (naf ahaantooda) baa u ah ciidan u soo gurmada14.
arabic: لَا يَسۡتَطِيعُونَ نَصۡرَهُمۡ وَهُمۡ لَهُمۡ جُندٞ مُّحۡضَرُونَ
footnotes: 14. Iyagoo ilaaliya oo dhowra ilaahyadooda beenta ah. Tafsiir kale waa inay ilaahyadaasi ahaan askar colkood ah iyaga Naarta gudaheeda.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: lā yastaṭīʿūna naṣrahum wahum lahum jundun muḥ'ḍarūna
